harry.name: harry
harry.vibe: This playlist makes me want to rent a camper van and drive up the Pacific Coast Highway. Too bad I get cold so easily!

wesley.name: wesley
wesley.vibe: Wesley runs a digital studio, so I knew he'd appreciate this playlist full of album art I like. It tends towards the moody, introspective side of things, as many creative types are.

kellie.name: kellie
kellie.vibe: Paris by Night, but ([not this one](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paris_by_Night)). Starts out with music you'd listen to over a candlelit dinner, but when in Paris you have to go dancing afterwards!

jess.name: jess
jess.description: 1 user has chosen not to be in this view

zara.name: zara
zara.description: Boybands, girl groups, and posse cuts.
zara.vibe: I don't actually know how much Zara likes hip-hop and the first half reads somewhat like an introduction to the genre. Korea is cranking out some of the most interesting pop in the world, however.

michelle-li.name: michelle-li
michelle-li.description: Teen angst of the social media variety
The soundtrack of a low-budget documentary about the Internet someday.

karen.name: karen
karen.vibe:
Karen went viral this year. This is her company.
 You should know most of these, but while you're here check out the [Thomas the Tank Engine remix of My Neck, My Back](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tmmCW8Cz7mE), It's the best song on the Internet by far.

rosa.name: rosa
rosa.vibe: Rosa's such an upbeat person! I can't imagine her crying, but if she is, she's probably dancing while doing it.

kat.name: kat
kat.vibe: Kat and I met Jay Som at her last show in Oakland! One day I'll have both of them over for tea and have this playing in the background.

josh.name: josh
josh.vibe: Josh [writes about music for a living](https://www.npr.org/sections/allsongs/2018/04/20/604353432/ariana-grandes-no-tears-left-to-cry-pushes-past-grief) and has introduced me to much more music than vice versa. What do you give to impress the man? It's impossible.

jesse.name: jesse
jesse.description: My favorite 2018 tunes by artists of color
jesse.vibe: Sounds like Pitchfork, honestly. What can I say? Mitski made me cry live and I'm so happy that she's everyone's AOTY.

risha.name: risha
risha.description: Songs that make me feel like a badass
risha.vibe: This one goes hard. Genre-wise thereâ€™s a lot of variety, from punk to pop to hip-hop, but it maintains the same level of energy throughout.

father-john-mitski.name: father-john-mitski
father-john-mitski.vibe: What do you think of when you hear the words, 'Father John Mitski'? To me it's a generic shitty Tinder ex looking for a manic pixie dream girl. He'll make you a playlist with all these songs you haven't heard before...

stephen.name: stephen
stephen.vibe: Stephen's about to move to Detroit to embark on a new journey. I wanted to give him a soundtrack to reflect on his time in the Bay. The first part of the playlist is mostly songs that have significance to our friendshipâ€”he introduced me to Mitski the first time we met. The second half are songs I think that he should know.

nikhil.name: nikhil
nikhil.vibe: INFP stands for Introverted/iNtuitive/Feeling/Perceiving; it's one of the 16 Meyers-Briggs personality types. INFPs tend to be moody and introspective, to the point of overthinking things. Nikhil and I both share the personality type and joke about it.

carrie.name: carrie
carrie.description: Good music with crazy music videos
carrie.vibe: It's like your stereotypical adult contemporary radio station, but fucking weird. Look up the music videos for these.

kobe.name: kobe
kobe.vibe: A starter pack for how to code/clean/study whilst emo.
